section.title: Install dictionaries
section.note: These installation instructions are for OpenOffice.org 2.4.x. We have also have installation instructions for OpenOffice.org 3.x

ol.li: Download the dictionaries. The package contains both Northern and Lule Sami dictionaries.
Choose the language you want to conduct the installation in (this is not where you choose Sámi)
Browse to where you stored the downloaded dictionary file
Choose which languages you would like to install (this is where you choose Sámi)
Press Next untill you come to the the screen where the wizard starts installing the dictionaries. Unmark the option in this screen to be sure that earlier installations are updated.
Choose "Read the information files ..." if you would like to read a short info on the installed files, then press Finish
Restart OpenOffice.org, including the Quickstarter (if used).

ul.li: Choose Font in the dialog that appears
